channel.title: How do i make a training portal/or training item
channel.description: ok. three questions. 1. How do I get a training Portal? What's code? 2. How do I make a item give xp - Genie Lamps. 3. How do i make them spawn places?

item.title: How do i make a training portal/or training item
item.dc:creator: @FS-X_OWNER FS-X OWNER
item.description:
@FS-X_OWNER wrote:

ok well heres how to drop lamps all around you with this command -> ::droplamps

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("droplamps")&& playerRights >= 2){
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX+1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX-1, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX+1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX-1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX+1, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX-1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(7498, absX, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
}

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a training portal/or training item
item.dc:creator: @aydem22 aydem22
item.description:
@aydem22 wrote:

Search in client.java for

 break;

Add right under it

case 10252://attk sendQuest("Attack", 2810); genieLamp = 1; break; case 10253://str sendQuest("Strength", 2810); genieLamp = 2; break; case 10254://ranged sendQuest("Ranged", 2810); genieLamp = 3; break; case 10255://magick sendQuest("Magic", 2810); genieLamp = 4; break; case 11000://def sendQuest("Defence", 2810); genieLamp = 5; break; case 11001://hp sendQuest("Hitpoints", 2810); genieLamp = 6; break; case 11002://pryr sendQuest("Prayer", 2810); genieLamp = 7; break; case 11003://agility sendQuest("Agility", 2810); genieLamp = 8; break; case 11004://herblore sendQuest("Herblore", 2810); genieLamp = 9; break; case 11005://thieving sendQuest("Thieving", 2810); genieLamp = 10; break; case 11006://crafting sendQuest("Crafting", 2810); genieLamp = 11; break; case 11007://rc sendQuest("Runecrafting", 2810); genieLamp = 12; break; case 47002://slayr sendQuest("Slayer", 2810); genieLamp = 13; break; case 54090://farmin sendQuest("Farming", 2810); genieLamp = 14; break; case 11008://mining sendQuest("Mining", 2810); genieLamp = 15; break; case 11009://smithing sendQuest("Smithing", 2810); genieLamp = 16; break; case 11010://fishing sendQuest("Fishing", 2810); genieLamp = 17; break; case 11011://cooking sendQuest("Cooking", 2810); genieLamp = 18; break; case 11012://fm sendQuest("Firemaking", 2810); genieLamp = 19; break; case 11013://wc sendQuest("Woodcutting", 2810); genieLamp = 20; break; case 11014://fletching sendQuest("Fletching", 2810); genieLamp = 21; break; case 11015://confirm button if(genieLamp == 1) { addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[0]), 0); sendMessage("You where granted Attack experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 2) { addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[2]), 2); sendMessage("You where granted Strength experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 3) { addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[4]), 4); sendMessage("You where granted Ranged experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 4) { addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[6]), 6); sendMessage("You where granted Magic experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 5) { addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[1]), 1); sendMessage("You where granted Defense experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 6) { addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[3]), 3); sendMessage("You where granted Hitpoints experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 7) { addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[5]), 5); sendMessage("You where granted prayer experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 8) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[16]), 16); sendMessage("You where granted Agility experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 9) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[15]), 15); sendMessage("You where granted Herblore experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 10) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[17]), 17); sendMessage("You where granted Thieving experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 11) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[12]), 12); sendMessage("You where granted Crafting experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 12) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[20]), 20); sendMessage("You where granted Runecrafting experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 13) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[18]), 18); sendMessage("You where granted Slayer experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 14) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[19]), 19); sendMessage("You where granted Farming experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 15) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[14]), 14); sendMessage("You where granted Mining experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 16) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[13]), 13); sendMessage("You where granted Smithing experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 17) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[10]), 10); sendMessage("You where granted Fishing experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 18) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[7]), 7); sendMessage("You where granted Cooking experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 19) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[11]), 11); sendMessage("You where granted Firemaking experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 20) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[8]), 8); sendMessage("You where granted Woodcutting experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else if(genieLamp == 21) { addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[9]), 9); sendMessage("You where granted Fletching experiance!"); RemoveAllWindows(); deleteItem(2528, GetItemSlot(2528), 1); } else { sendMessage("Pick a stat to advance before clicking confirm."); } break;

I’m pretty sure you can add this anywhere, but make sure you add it after a

break;

If any good coders saw I did something wrong, sorry, just fix it…

Also, if anyone saw this helpful, (if I did it correctly) please +rep
I still have 10 -.- If you don’t it doesn’t matter…

Read full topic
